Uses of Class
jsoul.midi.Note

    • Uses of Note in jsoul.midi

      Methods in jsoul.midi that return Note 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Note Chord.getNote(int i)
      Returns a note at a specific position in the chord.
      Note[] Chord.getNotes()
      Returns the notes in the chord as an array of note objects, sorted in ascending order from lowest to highest pitch.
      Methods in jsoul.midi with parameters of type Note 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Note.compareTo(Note other)
      Compares this note to another Note by pitch.
      static void Player.play(Note n)
      Plays the given note.
      void MidiFile.writeToFile(Note n)
      Writes a single note to a MIDI file, using the file name specified in the MidiFile's constructor.
